girl.crystal_refraction: 1girl, beautiful face split into fragments like a kaleidoscope, reflections scattered, glowing shards
girl.void_skin: 1girl, elegant but her skin fades into pure void, eyes like galaxies, calm expression
girl.asymmetrical_goddess: 1girl, stunning but with mismatched wings and legs, regal dress floating off her body
girl.glass_masked: 1girl, breathtaking with a cracked glass mask partially hiding her face, mysterious eyes shining through
girl.headless_grace: 1girl, perfectly dressed, elegant pose, her head floating nearby with a gentle smile
girl.liquid_body: 1girl, beautiful face, body made of flowing transparent liquid, shape constantly shifting
girl.pixel_tear: 1girl, glitching at the edges, pixels falling from her skin, crying glowing particles
girl.ribbon_wrapped: 1girl, suspended midair, entire body wrapped in glowing ribbons, serene look
girl.clock_heart: 1girl, open chest revealing ticking clock inside, expression of quiet sadness
girl.mirror_spine: 1girl, back exposed to reveal a spine made of mirrors reflecting alternate realities

scenery.inverted_sky: sky is below and ground is above, gravity reversed, clouds falling upward, colors unnatural
scenery.memory_cascade: landscape composed of floating photograph fragments, memories fading midair
scenery.looping_bridge: bridge that loops endlessly in the sky, vanishing into itself, dreamy haze
scenery.time_rift_forest: forest frozen in multiple seasons simultaneously, color distortion everywhere
scenery.fragmented_dimension: space with chunks of reality missing, landscape stitched together from different worlds
scenery.crystal_desert: desert where sand is made of singing crystals, sunlight refracted like rainbows
scenery.floating_horizon: horizon line suspended midair, terrain dissolving beneath it
scenery.tower_of_waves: ocean waves stacked vertically into a tower, boats circling it upward
scenery.city_in_mist: city made of soft fog and light, buildings flicker in and out of view
scenery.glass_mountain: mountain range entirely transparent, light bending across its jagged edges

animal.face_blended_wolf: wolf with part-human eyes and elegant features, glowing fur, silent power
animal.mirrored_tiger: tiger with perfect bilateral symmetry, one side organic, one side glass
animal.origami_owl: owl folded from shimmering paper, unfolding mid-flight, trails of ink in the air
animal.neon_whale: gigantic whale floating through night sky, glowing lines across its body, stars refracting off it
animal.mechanical_kitten: adorable but eerie kitten with chrome skeleton visible beneath translucent fur
animal.melting_horse: horse mid-gallop, body melting into paint streams as it runs
animal.ghost_deer: ethereal deer glowing faintly, walking through solid objects without resistance
animal.clock_faced_fox: fox with a ticking clock as a face, tail spinning like hands
animal.cloud_snake: serpent composed of cloud segments and lightning veins, drifting through the air
animal.fractured_dog: dog with body made of stained glass, light leaking from cracks

pair.split_face_lovers: two beautiful girls sharing one mirrored face, opposite expressions, lighting clash
pair.mirror_kiss: girl kissing her own reflection in a cracked floating mirror, emotional tension
pair.burning_and_frozen: two dancers—one engulfed in flame, one in snowflakes—spinning midair together
pair.looping_twins: two girls endlessly chasing each other in a Möbius strip path, each unaware of the loop
pair.back_to_back_future: elegant girl and her future self sitting back to back in a broken clock chamber
pair.linked_by_light: two girls bound by beams of solid light stretching between them, floating in void
pair.shadow_and_clone: girl facing her own shadow clone in a dramatic pose, both glowing differently
pair.halo_and_horns: angelic girl and her devilish twin sitting on a giant scale floating above ruins
pair.inverted_embrace: girl holding another upside down in midair, dresses swirling like spirals
pair.cracked_unity: pair with fractured bodies that perfectly align when standing together, eerie harmony
